skill.name: deepchem
skill.description: Molecular machine learning toolkit. Property prediction (ADMET, toxicity), GNNs (GCN, MPNN), MoleculeNet benchmarks, pretrained models, featurization, for drug discovery ML.
skill.summary: Molecular machine learning toolkit. Property prediction (ADMET, toxicity), GNNs (GCN, MPNN), Molecul...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: No credential access, environment harvesting, or exfiltration patterns were found. Scripts focus on local model training and documented DeepChem usage.

content.value_statement: Molecular datasets are hard to featurize and evaluate fairly. This skill provides DeepChem workflows for data loading, model training, and metrics.
actual_capabilities: Train solubility models with scaffold splitting and metrics
Train GCN, GAT, AttentiveFP, MPNN, and DMPNN models on MoleculeNet
Run transfer learning with ChemBERTa or GROVER on datasets
Load custom CSV datasets with DeepChem featurizers
Evaluate models with ROC-AUC, R2, MAE, and RMSE
limitations: Requires DeepChem and its dependencies to be installed
Pretrained models require downloads on first use
MolFormer is listed but not implemented in transfer learning script
Focuses on molecular data workflows, not general ML tasks

use_cases.title: Benchmark on MoleculeNet
use_cases.description: Train and compare graph models on standard datasets with scaffold splits and metrics.

use_cases.title: Predict solubility fast
use_cases.description: Train a solubility model on Delaney or custom CSV data with clear evaluation output.

use_cases.title: Fine-tune pretrained models
use_cases.description: Apply ChemBERTa or GROVER for small molecular datasets and review performance.

prompt_templates.title: Start with solubility
prompt_templates.prompt: Train a solubility model using the default benchmark. Summarize dataset sizes and key metrics.

prompt_templates.title: Custom CSV training
prompt_templates.prompt: Use my CSV with columns smiles and activity. Train a model, use scaffold split, and report ROC-AUC and accuracy.

prompt_templates.title: Choose a GNN
prompt_templates.prompt: Train an AttentiveFP model on Tox21 with scaffold split. Provide validation and test scores.

prompt_templates.title: Transfer learning run
prompt_templates.prompt: Fine-tune ChemBERTa on BBBP for classification. Report train, valid, and test ROC-AUC.

output_examples.input: Train a GCN on the Delaney dataset and summarize results.
output: Reported R2, MAE, and RMSE for train, valid, and test

best_practices: Start with a simple baseline before complex models
anti_patterns: Use random splitting for drug discovery data
Skip evaluation on a held-out test set
Train deep models on very small datasets without transfer learning

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill provides instructions and scripts that can be used from these platforms.

faq.question: What are the main limits?
faq.answer: It only covers DeepChem molecular workflows and does not implement MolFormer training.

faq.question: Can it integrate with my CSV data?
faq.answer: Yes. The scripts accept custom CSV files with SMILES and target columns.

faq.question: Does it access or transmit my data?
faq.answer: No. The scripts operate locally and do not include any data exfiltration logic.

faq.question: What should I do if DeepChem fails to import?
faq.answer: Install DeepChem with required extras such as torch or all and retry the script.

faq.question: How does this compare to general ML skills?
faq.answer: It focuses on molecular data, featurizers, and DeepChem specific models and datasets.
